query.default: select Id, ToName, FromName, ToZipCode, FromZipCode, ToPlace, FromPlace from Sungero_Reports_Envelopes where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by Id

query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256), [Id] int NOT NULL, [ToName] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [FromName] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [ToZipCode] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [FromZipCode] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [ToPlace] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [FromPlace] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL)
query.postgres: create table if not exists {0} (ReportSessionId citext, Id int NOT NULL, ToName citext NOT NULL, FromName citext NOT NULL, ToZipCode citext NOT NULL, FromZipCode citext NOT NULL, ToPlace citext NOT NULL, FromPlace citext NOT NULL)
